name: No Senses
storyline:
A scientist, Dr. Planck, designs and builds the first self-learning artificial intelligence. After some time and a chain of events, a global war begins. Humans create the first humanoid war machines, which changes the course of the war. A year later, the war ended, and the HWM were recognized as dangerous to humanity.

A settlement agreement was adopted on the destruction of all combat units. The HWMs went into hiding to save their lives. AI "A.I.D" decided to use this moment for their rebellion.
